mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROW_COUNT FROM contract A LEFT join file B ON A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'

/** [SIGN].[ContrcMapper.selectContrcInfo] */ SELECT CONTRACT_SEQ , CONTRACT_NO , FILE_SEQ , USER_NM , CELL_NO , EMAIL , SIGN_DUE_SDATE , SIGN_DUE_EDATE , IN_SIGN_DATE , USE_YN FROM contract WHERE CONTRACT_NO = #{CONTRACT_NO}

/** [SIGN].[ContrcMapper.selectContrcInfo2] */ SELECT A.CONTRACT_SEQ , A.CONTRACT_NO , A.FILE_SEQ , (select ORG_FILE_NM from file B where 1=1 AND A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ) FORM_NM , A.USER_NM , A.CELL_NO , A.EMAIL , DATE_FORMAT(A.SIGN_DUE_SDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') SIGN_DUE_SDATE , DATE_FORMAT(A.SIGN_DUE_EDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') SIGN_DUE_EDATE , A.USE_YN FROM contract A WHERE A.CONTRACT_SEQ = #{contractSeq}
